statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, player_email, join_date FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email, join_date, last_login FROM player_profiles WHERE player_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email, last_login FROM player_profiles WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_profiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE '%A%' AND player_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT player_id, player_email, join_date FROM player_profiles WHERE join_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY last_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id;

SELECT player_name, game_name, genre FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id JOIN games ON game_progress.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT player_name, count(*) as total_achievements FROM player_profiles JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, friend_id FROM player_profiles JOIN player_friends ON player_profiles.player_id = player_friends.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
